name: Samantha Reed
summary: Senior Data Analyst with 4 years of experience in the retail industry. Proficient in Tableau, adept at transforming complex data into actionable insights to drive strategic decision-making.

experience.title: Senior Data Analyst
experience.description: Led cross-functional teams to optimize inventory management strategies, resulting in a 15% reduction in carrying costs.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Implemented predictive analytics models to forecast customer demand, increasing sales by 10%.

projects.name: Customer Segmentation Analysis

projects.name: Sales Forecasting Model
